text: Mubattenga wonna wemubanga mu basanze, era mubaggye mu bifo ebyo bye babaggyamu kubanga bulijjo effitina mbi nnyo okusinga okutta. Temubalwanyisizanga mu muzigiti ogw'emizizo okugyako nga babalwanyisizzaamu, bwe baba babalwanyisizza nammwe mubalwanyise; empeera y'abatakkiriza bw'etyo bwebeera
